lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I love having the opportunity to give the gift of achievement and self esteem to others
lender.occupational_info: I run a charitable foundation

lender.name: frederick
lender.loan_because: It's neat to cut out the middlemen.
lender.occupational_info: Primary care medicine

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I believe that providing access to "catalytic capital" will improve the lives of people in developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: My day job involves interacting with entrepreneurs, so Kiva is a natural extension of that work.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to bless others.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I design pages for a Canadian magazine, take photos and art direct projects for my clients.

lender.name: Susan & Joe
lender.occupation: My husband is a School Administrator, and I
lender.loan_because: We like to help people achieve their dreams!
lender.occupational_info:
My husband and I work in American schools internationally, currently in Bahia, Brasil. The lessons are taught in English to locals and children from all parts of the world.
Once upon a time, we lived in Burlington County, New Jersey, but now our address changes every two years to a different part of the world. Who knows where we'll be next!
We see there is need, all over the world. Many families want exactly what we want, a chance to provide our families with shelter, food and a better life.
This program provides an opportunity to those who have a desire to make a difference in their lives.
My goal is, hopefully, one day, to become a Field Partner....I have a dream.
bahiasue@hotmail.com

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do...

lender.name: Wally
lender.loan_because: I heard how microcredit can make a huge difference in the lives of people who have so little & just did the right thing.
lender.occupational_info: I'm semi-retired & decided to run away from the culture of greed & consumption in Canada. I have a farm in Costa Rica & donate my time to good causes.

lender.name: Quincy
lender.loan_because: All human beings are part of my family, and I want to make the world a little bit better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a public school in San Antonio, Texas.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I respect all people trying to better their lives through honest work.
lender.occupational_info: I travel and teach English to better understand and communicate within our diverse world. Currently, I teach Korean university students.

lender.name: joe
lender.loan_because: giving to help create a sustainable world is a life intention.
lender.occupational_info: Gratefully accepting the inspiration of others, like the stakeholders in kiva.org and ted.com, to energize me to be of service.

lender.name: Bill and Betty Jo
lender.occupational_info: We help direct a local non-profit agency dedicated to land conservation and nature education. Bill also volunteers for NH Audubon and serves on a local Emergency Medical Services squad.

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that need the money.
lender.occupational_info: I am in third grade,and I am 8 years old,and I like reading.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I have some bucks I may use in the future. There're people who do need it than me now. Hope little money makes huge improvement for people's life.

lender.name: Lewis Xmas Fund
lender.loan_because: Our family makes donations instead of giving each other Xmas gifts. This year we picked Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: My parents have a family farm, rising small grains and beef cattle. The 20 or so of us (children, spouses, grandchildren and great grandchildren) have different jobs in medicine, law, manufacturing, management, agriculture and labor.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.

lender.name: Cherylee and family
lender.loan_because: I am in the business of helping people become healthy, happy and who they really are. Helping with Kiva loans is a way I can do that around the world. Every person deserves a chance to better themselves and help make this world a place of peace and love.
lender.occupational_info: My family and I have milk goats, cats, a dog, a pig and chickens. We also have a greenhouse to grow food in the winter and we grow a large garden in the summer. We love to learn about sustainability and put it to work on our little one acre.

lender.name: Hayley
lender.loan_because: I feel as though this is really helping people in a small amazing way.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because:
I love humanity.
"O Thou kind Lord! Thou hast created all humanity from the same stock. Thou hast decreed that all shall belong to the same household. In Thy Holy Presence they are all Thy servants, and all mankind are sheltered beneath Thy Tabernacle; all have gathered together at Thy 102 Table of Bounty; all are illumined through the light of Thy Providence.
O God! Thou art kind to all, Thou hast provided for all, dost shelter all, conferrest life upon all. Thou hast endowed each and all with talents and faculties, and all are submerged in the Ocean of Thy Mercy.
O Thou kind Lord! Unite all. Let the religions agree and make the nations one, so that they may see each other as one family and the whole earth as one home. May they all live together in perfect harmony.
O God! Raise aloft the banner of the oneness of mankind.
O God! Establish the Most Great Peace.
Cement Thou, O God, the hearts together.
O Thou kind Father, God! Gladden our hearts through the fragrance of Thy love. Brighten our eyes through the Light of Thy Guidance. Delight our ears with the melody of Thy Word, and shelter us all in the Stronghold of Thy Providence.
Thou art the Mighty and Powerful, Thou art the Forgiving and Thou art the One Who overlooketh the shortcomings of all mankind."
- 'Abdu'l-Bah from the Baha'i Writings
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student studying to be a Teacher of Social Studies. I plan to teacher internationally at the middle school or high school level.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I have always been inspired by aspiring entrepreneurs. In a few weeks I will be getting married. In order to share the joy of our wedding around the world, my fiance and I have decided to sponsor an entrepreneur in honor of each of the tables at our wedding. We hope our guests will share our enthusiasm and learn more about Kiva.

lender.name: Kira's Family
lender.loan_because: we want to help others succeed in their business ventures.
lender.occupational_info: We are grain farmers in western Canada, growing canola, wheat and barley. We also have a dog, six cats and three horses.

lender.name: Kathleen Worsley
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount can help greatly

lender.name: Marci
lender.loan_because: I believe in this cause.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Others should have the opportunities I have.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a non-profit organization that helps people with their housing needs. We help them find housing and then give them advice for when they have problems with their landlords.

lender.name: Devon
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should have the opportunity to dream and have the means of achieving that dream.

lender.name: Mike & Kathy
lender.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am an IT Director for a non-profit helping to feed children in the United States, my wife is a pre-school teacher.

lender.name: hahuynh
lender.loan_because: couldn't think of a reason not to.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: To be a small catalyst for entrepreneurship
lender.occupational_info: We help organizations create innovative and colloaborative strategies and stay around to help them implement

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Providing "A Hand Up" with a small investment that can make such a difference for someone in a developing country.
lender.occupational_info: Fundraising development and communications for an environmental organization involved with conservation of ecologically signficant lands. Semi retired. My wife and I enjoy spending time with our two grandchildren. Member of local Rotary Club that has also signed up with KIVA.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: I believe in your ability to succeed and have a good life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage condominiums is St. Louis, MO.

lender.name: Moroney Family
lender.loan_because: I chose to use our Christmas Gift money for the Moroney family to provide a loan to a family in need.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I'd like these entrepreneurs to know that others care for them and support them. I'd like to help others have the opportunity to make better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage teams that build large websites.

lender.name: Giannella Family
lender.loan_because: Our family decided to start a tradition of lending together. We hope to do our part to help others around the globe reach abundance. In time, our great great grandchildren will inherit a better world - Elvira, Joey, Vivian, Cynthia, Rossella
lender.occupational_info:
Our family came from Salerno Italy. Kiva is a way to give back now that we are living well. From the book: Awakening Social Responsibility
"If others are poor, no matter how wealthy we are, we experience the consequence of impoverishment."

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I hope that these people can feel empowered by success.
lender.occupational_info: I fly airliners around the United States, Mexico & Canada

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: This has a FAR better return than my current checking account interest rate. ;o)
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that Googlers on international assignment have sufficient health insurance coverage.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: teaching people to believe in themselves and giving them new opportunities can help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying land use planning and sustainability as a graduate student at Arizona State University.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate and want to share with others who need a little help in making a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am blessed with five beautiful and healthy grandchildren. I wish happiness and health for all children of the world. May the earth continue to become more peaceful and life sustaining as hearts soften and we see the beauty in all living creatures.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: we all have a stake in each other and I feel a personal responsibility to help make a difference for somebody else in the world.

lender.name: Shu
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with so much.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I love my job, it connects me to others and gives me the chance to help while making a living

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: Each one of us can make a difference, and everyone should have an opportunity to accomplish their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a global group of engineers who build computer software.

lender.name: The Coopers
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people become self-sufficient, not just giving handouts.

lender.name: NewOrleansConnection
lender.loan_because: Love to see hard working people get a chance to be successful entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: helping others to succeed in school, business and life

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-lending is one of the most revolutionary and brilliant ideas, and that we can make the world more equitable if we all try to make a difference in our lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a counselor and I work with people who have had problems and need someone to talk to about them.

lender.name: Jim (Bud)
lender.loan_because: I believe in the small business.Communities grow thru them.

lender.name: Ginnia & Jamiah
lender.loan_because: We are one world and we need to take care of each other by leaving this world better than when we entered it.
lender.occupational_info: Ginnia - I work for the Little Village Community Development Corporation as their Resource Coordinator for the Castellanos Middle School by planning, organizing and implementing after school activities for the students. I am also a dancer in the Corpo Dance Company. Jamiah - I deal with the legal side of trade financial securities and am the Financial Director of a community garden nonprofit with hopes of migrating to the nonprofit sector in the future.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I LOVE TO HELP PEOPLE HELP THEMSELVES
lender.occupational_info: I TEACH PEOPLE HOW TO EMPOWER THEMSELVES

lender.name: Roxanne
lender.loan_because: People deserve more aid from those in affluent countries and everyone has the right to an equal opportunity for advancement.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sophomore in college and hope to help people someday.

lender.name: Ralf
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering other people.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I have been truly blessed and would like to be more of a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: Media & Entertainment Executive

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Because this is a great project and I am proud to be a part of it. I love seeing and reading about all these wonderful people around the world who are hard working and looking to improve their lives. Kudos.
lender.occupational_info: retired teacher in the process of raising two great kids!

lender.name: Steven
lender.occupational_info: I buy small pieces of companies and then sell them at higher prices.

lender.name: Jeni
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to the needs of people in a meaningful way.
lender.occupational_info: I work mainly with young children with developmental disabilities.

lender.name: Nico & Justine
lender.loan_because: We like to foster entrepreunership around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I set up partnerships for a large internet company while my wife paints for a living. We are blessed with 2 lovely boys.

lender.name: Mickey
lender.loan_because:
I have been fortunate to have traveled around Central and South America a lot with our coffee business.
Seeing how hard most people work for such little money I am very happy there is a way that I can personally help out these wonderful people to work towards a better life for them and their families.
lender.occupational_info:
I am President and Co-Founder of a sustainable coffee company in BC Canada founded in 1996.
My life long goal has been to do my part in making the world a better place. I can now do it through our business.

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: i want to help someone else
lender.occupational_info: checking all kind of goods that has been imported or exported. My workarea is the harbour pf rotterdam, the netherlands

lender.name: Gustavo
lender.loan_because: I can loan. It's incredible how such a small amount of money can help people to change their lives. I'm certainly not able to change the whole World but I know can change it a tiny little bit...
lender.occupational_info: I play in an orchestra in Oulu (Finland) and I teach in a conservatory as well.

lender.name: Pat Inge Yoyo Lucky
lender.loan_because: If you can, you should

lender.name: Rory
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you want to see in the world!"

lender.name: Karim
lender.loan_because: I wanted to do something concrete to help hard-working people in poorer countries better their lives. With Micro-finance, I know my money's going to deserving people who need it. Unlike traditional aid, it's not going to fund gold-plated Mercs for corrupt leaders, or unnecessary utopian construction projects.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: It is time to give back! I believe that direct giving can have a large impact on an individual and a community. I have had the good fortune to have traveled to many remote parts of the world and often thought how just a small investment could make a difference in a life. Kiva provides an excellent opportunity to make that happen. I am grateful for the many chances I have been given and want to now provide those chances to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am with a small but very successful division of a large corporation that is involved in providing tools for scientific research.

lender.name: cherie
lender.loan_because: I believe in passing it forward. Life can be hard and sometimes all it takes is the smallest amount of support from others to make all the difference.

lender.name: Kristoffer
lender.loan_because: I hope it can make a difference for someone.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a molecular biology student in the north of Sweden

lender.name: Kilgore
lender.loan_because: Anything we can do to make the world a better place - will help us all.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others
lender.occupational_info: I help people to be more successful

lender.name: chuks
lender.loan_because: my business needs a capital intensive project
lender.occupational_info: i carve different types of art work in a different perspective

lender.name: Zeke's Humans
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help people in our global community.

lender.name: Kaye
lender.loan_because: I like to share my blessings.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work for a financial advisor. We help our clients invest their money for their future needs.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to encourage people to make a long term investment in themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I try to explain different ways that Governments are improving lives and I try to make Government as open and accountable as possible

lender.name: Cobb & Associates
lender.loan_because: there are people in need who are trying hard to improve their own lives and the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I consult with schools on issues of culture and climate and how they affect the character of schools and influence the future of children.

lender.name: Kieran
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have every opportunity to succeed in this life. The stories you read are about people who are or certainly should be role models for the rest of us.

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: loaning is cool.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a medium-sized coffee shop and am a volunteer firefighter and medic.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I create web sites on the internet.

lender.name: Brenda Taylor
lender.loan_because: My contribution was in the form of a Holiday gift certificate to my life coach. She has been guiding me through the process of living more authentic life. I thought this would be a good way for the two of us to assist another person in their life journey.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: Traveling in the Dominican Republic, I was humbled by the hope that I saw on the faces of the people I met. If I can help by sharing what I have been blessed with, then I can help to perpetuate hope.
lender.occupational_info: Supporting members of my team to be successful.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because:
It's good to share.
Pic taken in Siberia summer 2009.

lender.name: LAURA
lender.loan_because: I like to help
lender.occupational_info: Process payments and take accident reports by phone for an insurance company

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I would appreciate the help if I was in their shoes.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Realtor who has been receiving cancer treatment for the past 6 years.

lender.name: Satish
lender.loan_because: it makes the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: I help companies to get their environmental licenses so they can start their business. In my free time I'm a musician.

lender.name: Darren Lum
lender.loan_because: I believe the people of the World can unite to give through this platform where it is able to reach out to those really in need and help fight poverty. One loan of $25 makes no impact, but if millions of people around the World were to feel the same cause and combine their millions of $25, I believe the World would be a better place for all.
lender.occupational_info: I build for the betterment of mankind. While the urbanised societies advance in leaps, we also must help those in need to be able to move forward.

lender.name: Greg, Marlene, & Maggie
lender.loan_because: it is our little drop in the great big bucket.

lender.name: The Mehnert family
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to show my kids how they can help other people.
lender.occupational_info: Jim is a Geotechnical engineer and designs foundations and other structures below ground. Julie takes care of Sophia and William who are 5 and 7.

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: This program has enormous potential to change the world for almost no real investment. For the price of a lunch, one can make a real difference. Loans are the lifeblood of all business, large or small.
lender.occupational_info: Investor, business owner, trying to create jobs, and opportunities, and make a change of some manner in the world and community I live in.

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: This is my opportunity to support the positive energies that other people are putting into their lives. My hope is that together we make this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: My work is mostly boring (keeping track of numbers)-- but I love the flexible hours that allow me the opportunity to breed service dogs for Canine Companions for Independence and to visit clients of LAPS (Loving Animals Providing Smiles) with my own therapy dog.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupational_info: I work with a non-profit foundation that supports other grassroots non-profits aiming to make our world more equitable, healthy and humane.

lender.name: Jeroen
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Work with computers, some call me a magician.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: MaryAnn
lender.loan_because: Investing in the world is the best way to bring peace.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired involve myself in a lot of volunteer work within the community where I live.

lender.name: Spanish School
lender.occupation: Habla Hispana - Spanish School in Mexico
lender.loan_because: to make grow and share the wealth is one of the best ways to keep the world in peace.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Spanish school in San Miguel de Allende, Mexico offering intensive Spanish program year around.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: A little kindness can change a person's life

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe in you.
lender.occupational_info: I work to give people safe and fair working conditons.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility as a human being to help those in need. What brings greater joy than putting a smile on another's face and pride in their hearts. Thanks Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people who may not be able to help themselves at moments, because of physical and emotional (dis) advantages.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I have learned the exceptionally high value of "micro-loans" through presentations on ted.com, through the work of a daughter that is frequently in Africa, and through Bill Clinton's recent book. Thank you for providing a vehicle where our family can help other families and entrepreneurs in a unique way.
lender.occupational_info: Semi-retired. Assist business leaders in organizational change and strategy implementation. Also conduct custom education and motivational programs.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I help collect data on US business growth through the Economic Census and other surveys.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: it is an easy way to help those less fortunate.

lender.name: Lotta
lender.occupational_info: My students are adults from Sweden as well as all parts of the world

lender.name: Paige Vieyra
lender.loan_because: "We need to be the change we wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to help others and connects me in a small way to people around the world.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I work hard and appreciate others who work hard. When I sail I see people who need help in the way that Kiva helps people. I happen to be lucky and want to share in my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I build and repair homes for people, working with my hands and basic woodworking power tools. Here in the United States I am well paid for my labor, and I like to loan to other people who work hard with their hands around the world. We are all united in this.

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupational_info: I work to protect animals and plants from the impact of humans in this world. Please think about how your life impacts the wonderful creatures and land we enjoy!

lender.name: Jen and Gaz
lender.loan_because: We think it's a great way to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: MBR Foundation
lender.loan_because: Giving back is the socially responsible thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others directly. Making sure our family's good fortunes are spread to others of less fortunate means.

lender.name: Lizanne
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in developing countries......

lender.name: Eeva
lender.loan_because: I believe the best way to help other people, is to enable them to help themselves.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to give back to the less fortunate in the world! EVERYONE should be doing this.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back to my community/to those who need a helping hand
lender.occupational_info: Institutional Trust and Custody Banking - Pension and 401(k)

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Opportunity should not be a privilege.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I sometimes wonder if giving engenders dependance and strips away dignity. A loan allows one to help without the stigma of "charity". If these people are willing to take a risk to improve their lives, I am with them, they have my admiration and respect. I also hope that by helping a complete stranger, I will help, in a very small way, to foster a spirit of cooperation .
lender.occupational_info: My job is in IT sales, it is a good job although it has its challanges. I am very fortunate. I also have a small ebiz venture and it has thought me a lot about myself and the world.

lender.name: jj
lender.loan_because: I want like to help a few people that didn't get the opportunities that I did.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful way to invest. I love knowing that my money isn't just working for me, it's working for entrepreneurs and people in under-priviledged communities across the world.

lender.name: Ryan Baxter
lender.loan_because: i am a global citizen
lender.occupational_info: i study human rights and poli sci

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's a really good way to spread our resource around the world and balance things, at least a bit.
lender.occupational_info: I help students at a college know how to get through school and what they need to do and coordinate with teachers. Michael, my husband teaches people to take care of streams that provide drinking water for New York City.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I have personally seen the effects that poverty has on society and truly believe we can make a difference one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct investigations to find out if someone has done something against the law.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to better them selves.

lender.name: Ava & Coulter
lender.loan_because: We think this is an amazing concept! Where else can you essentially "recycle" your charitable donation. This is our best Christmas gift ever!
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of four in Guelph, Ontario.

lender.name: Jonna
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance
lender.occupational_info: Software

lender.name: Alex
lender.occupational_info: i goto school i learn to become better in the world market

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: As a seller of sustainable travel, I believe in supporting people locally, keeping money "in the neighborhood".
lender.occupational_info: I only use travel providers and services in-country because I want local people to stay in business and prosper.

lender.name: jill
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Letting people know about music CDs for sale and convincing them to buy.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to support people who want to create a better life for their family through small business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker. I love people and this earth. I am a graduate from University of Oregon with a Bachelor of Education in Family and Human Services. I am a mental health and social justice advocate. I work locally and nationally to help those in need through various non profit organizations. I have a passion for grant writing and find the work to be very rewarding. It is my hope to write many successful grants to serve need in the world.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need!

lender.name: Mike and Teddie
lender.loan_because: Blessings are meant to be shared.

lender.name: B-M A
lender.loan_because: I am.

lender.name: Jennnifer
lender.loan_because: I don't have any children to take care of, so I spend it on charity. I know that there are good groups out there that need money so I try to help when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work a lot with computers and the internet.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: We should all have equal opportunity to succeed and I believe people are smart, strong, and creative.

lender.name: Miles
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs help
lender.occupational_info: Health sciences research

lender.name: Richert
lender.loan_because: It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it. Giving frees us from the familiar territory of our own needs by opening our minds and hearts to the unexplained worlds occupied by the dreams and desires of others.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange FLOWERS for a living, specializing in WEDDING Floral arrangements. Petals are my Passion!!! Please visit my website below to view my body of work:

lender.name: The Bray Family
lender.loan_because: Our family pools our funds and lends instead of buying Christmas gifts for each other.

lender.name: K L
lender.loan_because: God desires all of us to make a difference in the lives of others, and because I have the resources to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I am a project manager for a construction management firm in New York City.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: it`s a great idea, and KIVA i reliable.
lender.occupational_info: principal of a College and a Academy

lender.name: Debby
lender.loan_because: It would be impossible not to after seeing this site, and I am so happy to be able to help!

lender.name: Robyne
lender.loan_because: You must be the change you want to see in the World

lender.name: AgnIngA
lender.loan_because: Helping others succeed will nurture OUR world and further reinforce our sense of community.

lender.name: ALYSSA
lender.loan_because: http://www.utilitarian.net/singer/by/1972----.htm
lender.occupational_info: 51% troublemaking, 49% troubleshooting

lender.name: Tamara
lender.occupation: owns moving company and distribution center
lender.loan_because: I belive in women owned businesses

lender.name: Bernard
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses to develop strategies to better manage their purchases from suppliers of materials and services.

lender.name: Coach Cate
lender.loan_because: I love helping others live empowered lives.
lender.occupational_info: I guide others to return to their birthright of self-love and self-acceptance so that they can live their purpose.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: it's good to give back.

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: It feels great to give back! :)

lender.name: Verne
lender.loan_because: I would like to help active, industrious, and resourceful people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies educate their employees so that they can be more productive and satisfied with their work.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school to become a Computer Scientist

lender.name: Del and Mary
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and our family and everybody needs a little help sometime.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves support to reach their goals.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I see it as a moral imperative to use my privilege in as progressive and empowering a way as I can. Instead of putting my money in a bank to make me (and the bank) slightly richer, I can offer opportunities to hard working people who deserve but have been denied them.
lender.occupational_info:
I deliver packages around Washington, D.C. on a bicycle.
I also work with a rural development group in El Salvador, leading service-learning trips.
I also try to de-construct power and privilege in my daily life, while fighting the systems that hold us all down.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I am very enthousiastic about micro financing, because what's micro for us can be a big think for the entrepreneur. Also I think investments in small business can be a good way of development.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a specialist in everything concerning small business

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Our future is tied to the futures of those with whom we share the planet.
lender.occupational_info: Educational Psychology

lender.name: julie
lender.loan_because: I want to help christians in other countries become self-sufficient and fruitful on their professions.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a healthcare clinic that incorporates Chiropractic, Physical Therapy and Massage Therapy.

lender.name: Gil and Becky
lender.loan_because: $25 to us is a lunch in town. To people living in less privileged areas of the world $25 can be truly life changing. We're all in this thing together. Thank you Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: Gil works in the timber industry in Northern California and Becky is the Associate Director of Admissions at Humboldt State University.

lender.name: Felicia
lender.loan_because: there seem to be so many women around the globe stiving to gain independence and success.
lender.occupational_info: I work with community members to make sure they have tools to communicate to their neighbors and the world.

lender.name: Jimmy, Kalee and Jackson
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Devinne
lender.loan_because: Even a little helps out a lot.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student going to school at U of O in Eugene, OR, and I'm working extremely hard to double major in Psychology and Sociology, and minoring in Business.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I think its a good way of giving, every time a loan comes back I will double up.
lender.occupational_info: I work in research in nuclear fusion to try to develop safe and sustainable energy for the World

lender.name: Kees
lender.loan_because: As president of a Fair Trade shop I see the many benefits of microfinancing. What we need is a different view on value and money, not only with microfinance, but also in our own economy: fair prices and fair profits.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have as many opportunities as needed to earn money and be independent.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a school for children with severe emotional and behavioral problems. Currently I am working with children who are between 5 and 8 years old.

lender.name: Gouri
lender.loan_because: I like to help others to be self sufficient and explore their possibilities.
lender.occupational_info: Corporate job. Work on technology.

lender.name: John & Debbie
lender.loan_because: If our little bit can help, maybe we can inspire others.

lender.name: Parag
lender.loan_because: I believe in the enterprenural spirit..

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: Helping people make their own living helps people, helps their children, and helps their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a small farmer in Saskatchewan, Canada.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: There is no greater joy than giving someone the opportunity to support themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a serial entrepeneur with a focus on consumer electronics and technology.

lender.name: Alana
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you wish to see in the world." ~Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I work to empower woman during pregnancy, childbirth and raising their children. An empowered woman changes the world.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I believe peace should be our top priority.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand their rights under the law so they can be better employees, employers, and members of our community.

lender.name: Etienne
lender.loan_because: want to make a difference in somebody's life
lender.occupational_info: Accounting and financial analysis

lender.name: Nick and Emmy
lender.loan_because: we care about people and we want to help them to have a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Hendrick & Angel
lender.loan_because: it's an expression of social justice.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: Every person who is connected to their core and their dreams makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I guide individuals and groups to what connects them at their cores to create more of what they want.

lender.name: Bobor
lender.loan_because: Hopefully on day I'll make it as an entrepreneur myself...

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Poverty Sucks! People are wonderful. Together we can overcome this !
lender.occupational_info: I am in Business School Studying Microfinance and International Business Development

lender.name: Amanda and Androo
lender.loan_because: Amanda: It is nice. I am nice. Androo: Beacuse it is the RIGHT thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Amanda: I'm Monkey Girl / Gymnast Androo: I'm Tomato Boy / Or Not

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I travel worldwide and clearly see the need for an organization like Kiva. The ability to lend 1-on-1 to people in need is revolutionary.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer who is lucky enough to travel around the globe and experience different cultures - it has opened my eyes to the world around me.

lender.name: Aric Clark
lender.loan_because: It doesn't get better than this. I may put my money to work over and over again helping those who have the drive and creativity to help themselves. There is nothing I would rather invest in.
lender.occupational_info: I pray, I read, I study, I worship.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn to fly.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I want others who may not have the funds to be able to have the supplies and resources to succeed in not only their lives and families but also in their business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student who is studying Graphic Media. In my free time I enjoy making crafts and beading. I also like to read. School keeps me very busy and I often study.

lender.name: Brandon and Nicole
lender.loan_because: To help people :)

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I write literary fiction - novels, short stories, etc.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed. And this is such an inspirational, proactive way to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Helping make people's houses their homes. We do this by making the interiors more comfortable, functional, and aesthically pleasing.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.occupational_info: I work in the admin department of a charity for older people in the UK, I deal with admin regarding our volunteers.

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: As an American I realize that I live better than 99% of the rest of the world. I feel privileged to have the ability to help those who are trying to better their lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I know that even the smallest bit of help goes a long way. Knowing that I have made a positive impact on someone else's life is all that I need to truly be happy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 19 year old student in college persuing a degree in communications and marketing.
